quest.name: ArmorForDagobert
quest.title: Armor For Dagobert
quest.description: Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos, asked me to find a leather_cuirass for him.

history.entry: I have met Dagobert. He is the consultant at the bank in Semos.
I promissed to find a leather_cuirass for him because he has been robbed.
He asked me to find a leather_cuirass but I rejected his request.
I found a leather_cuirass and will take it to Dagobert.
I took the leather_cuirass to Dagobert. He thanked me and gave a small reward.

hints.entry: I see that you will take a leather_cuirass from a dead cyclops.
I see that you will fight some cyclopes living in the dungeon deep under Semos.
